content: "http://firstread.msnbc.msn.com/archive/2009/03/19/1843837.aspx?GT1=43001" NBC's Chief White House Correspondent Chuck Todd wants to know what questions you'd like for him to ask President Obama during his prime time news conference next Tuesday night? Send him your ideas here. Ask how he will stop trying to cut military and veterns benefits. content: I would ask when we would see the change he claimed he was about. then I would say I didn't believe him since he has broken most of his huge campain promises he ran on, aside from the BIG ticket items. Todays politics remind me of an old saying. - "Ideas are more powerful than guns. We would not let our enemies have guns, why should we let them have ideas?" - Joseph Stalin

title: WHAT WOULD YOU ASK PRESIDENT OBAMA?

content: quote: Originally posted by ss_287: "http://firstread.msnbc.msn.com/archive/2009/03/19/1843837.aspx?GT1=43001" NBC's Chief White House Correspondent Chuck Todd wants to know what questions you'd like for him to ask President Obama during his prime time news conference next Tuesday night? Send him your ideas here. Ask how he will stop trying to cut military and veterns benefits. These members have put their life on the line in support of our nation and were promised health care and other benefits only to recently learn this administrations attempt to reduce or cut those promises. I would like to ask him: 1.]Who are the "Private Investors" that he will sell our economy to?... 2.]Who will pay for his stimulus and recovery plan?... 3.]If you can find no foreign governments to back our added debt, how will you prevent hyper inflation and the inability of the American people, to buy food, water, shelter and warmth?... 4.]Should the economy collapse, are you going to declare "martial law" and invalidate "posse comitatus"?... 5.]Why have you turned you back on your campaign promise to renegotiate NAFTA and it's Asian counter parts?... 6.]Why have turned you back on your campaign promise to control our borders... 7.]Why have you turned your back on your campaign promise to look into the situation with the border guards Ramos and Campaien?... 8.]Why did you water down the "buy American" clause in your recovery plan?... 9.]Why did you not include in your recovery plan the ability to deduct from federal income tax, the interest on home, auto and credit card loans, we had that ability at one time, why not reinstate it?... 10.]What are you going to do to stimulate the ability of the American populace to have "savings accounts" that actually pay a dividend?... 11.]Why has your administration restricted the manufacture and sale of ammunition and reloading supplies to the American civilian populace and why have you not made public the knowledge that you have done so?... 12.]Why have you ignored Art.1, Sec.9, Clause 3 of the U.S. Constitution, when it comes to "ex post facto" and "bills of attainder"?... 13.]Why are you planning on turning foreign nationals, captured on the battlefield, loose on the American citizenry, BEFORE it is ascertained whether or not they are active foreign combatants or sympathizers?... Respectfully, SUNLINER81 This message has been edited. Last edited by: SUNLINER81, Tue 24 March 2009 12:43 PM
quote: Originally posted by ss_287: "http://firstread.msnbc.msn.com/archive/2009/03/19/1843837.aspx?GT1=43001" NBC's Chief White House Correspondent Chuck Todd wants to know what questions you'd like for him to ask President Obama during his prime time news conference next Tuesday night? Send him your ideas here. Ask how he will stop trying to cut military and veterns benefits. These members have put their life on the line in support of our nation and were promised health care and other benefits only to recently learn this administrations attempt to reduce or cut those promises.

Respectfully, SUNLINER81 This message has been edited. Last edited by: SUNLINER81, Tue 24 March 2009 12:43 PM

title: WHAT WOULD YOU ASK PRESIDENT OBAMA?

content: quote: Originally posted by ss_287: "http://firstread.msnbc.msn.com/archive/2009/03/19/1843837.aspx?GT1=43001" NBC's Chief White House Correspondent Chuck Todd wants to know what questions you'd like for him to ask President Obama during his prime time news conference next Tuesday night? Send him your ideas here. Ask how he will stop trying to cut military and veterns benefits. These members have put their life on the line in support of our nation and were promised health care and other benefits only to recently learn this administrations attempt to reduce or cut those promises. I would like to ask him: 1.]Who are the "Private Investors" that he will sell our economy to?... 2.]Who will pay for his stimulus and recovery plan?... 3.]If you can find no foreign governments to back our added debt, how will you prevent hyper inflation and the inability of the American people, to buy food, water, shelter and warmth?... 4.]Should the economy collapse, are you going to declare "martial law" and invalidate "posse comitatus"?... 5.]Why have you turned you back on your campaign promise to renegotiate NAFTA and it's Asian counter parts?... 6.]Why have turned you back on your campaign promise to control our borders... 7.]Why have you turned your back on your campaign promise to look into the situation with the border guards Ramos and Campaien?... 8.]Why did you water down the "buy American" clause in your recovery plan?... 9.]Why did you not include in your recovery plan the ability to deduct from federal income tax, the interest on home, auto and credit card loans, we had that ability at one time, why not reinstate it?... 10.]What are you going to do to stimulate the ability of the American populace to have "savings accounts" that actually pay a dividend?... 11.]Why has your administration restricted the manufacture and sale of ammunition and reloading supplies to the American civilian populace and why have you not made public the knowledge that you have done so?... 12.]Why have you ignored Art.1, Sec.9, Clause 3 of the U.S. Constitution, when it comes to "ex post facto" and "bills of attainder"?... 13.]Why are you planning on turning foreign nationals, captured on the battlefield, loose on the American citizenry, BEFORE it is ascertained whether or not they are active foreign combatants or sympathizers?... Respectfully, SUNLINER81 This message has been edited. Last edited by: SUNLINER81, Tue 24 March 2009 12:43 PM
quote: Originally posted by ss_287: "http://firstread.msnbc.msn.com/archive/2009/03/19/1843837.aspx?GT1=43001" NBC's Chief White House Correspondent Chuck Todd wants to know what questions you'd like for him to ask President Obama during his prime time news conference next Tuesday night? Send him your ideas here. Ask how he will stop trying to cut military and veterns benefits. These members have put their life on the line in support of our nation and were promised health care and other benefits only to recently learn this administrations attempt to reduce or cut those promises.

Respectfully, SUNLINER81 This message has been edited. Last edited by: SUNLINER81, Tue 24 March 2009 12:43 PM
